message: Let's start with a fair, but slightly skewed offer. I'm confident we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. Let's see if you can do better!
I understand you're looking for more, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway this round, but time is ticking, and we both need to reach an agreement.
I'm not getting any younger, and the money is dwindling. I'll give you a slightly better deal this round, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. Let's make a move!
